name: International Conference on Material Science and Engineering
content: e are pleased to intimate you about our upcoming event International Conference on Material Science and Engineering during June 20 -21, 2024 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Materials Science 2024 will be a platform of interactions for experts around the world and aims to accelerate scientific discoveries.Our Material Science- 2024 Scientific Programming Committee is busy planning plenary, seminars, meeting the expert sessions, workshops, abstract and poster sessions, discussions, and debates. We will offer you a scientific program that covers the latest in best practices, research, guidelines, and technology from around the world.
